text:
Karisma files dowry harassment FIR

Actor Karisma Kapoor has registered an FIR, wherein she accuses her husband, Sanjay Kapur, of mental cruelty and harassment.

The duo had initially filed for divorce on the grounds of mutual consent, but Karisma withdrew her consent, stating that Sanjay had failed to meet certain financial commitments established in the consent terms.

On the other hand, Sanjay claimed that Karisma married him for his money. He also filed an application in the Supreme Court, seeking a transfer of the case to New Delhi on the grounds of threat to his life in connection to the ongoing marital strife.

The next hearing is scheduled for March 3. — ANI
title: Karisma files dowry harassment case against Sanjay Kapur
